name: Memories Off: Innocent Fille for Dearest
overview: When the severe cold was also relaxed. The day when Rui will return to Sapporo was approaching. It meant a farewell to those who came to Shonankairyo High School, met, exchanged hearts, and became irreplaceable beings. There is not much time left... What kind of memories will the memories leave? A love story for loved ones that send their "after" in an omnibus format.
